name: The Cube (itch) (Fivea)
description:
Very simple and short game. Use the "a" and "d" buttons to move side to side and try to avoid the obstacles. 

First game I ever made, so for now, there's not much to show.

The Exit button at the end is supposed to be for downloaded versions of the game, it will close the app down, so don't mind it here.
